trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Het element dat is gekoppeld met dit automation peer.

trans-unit.source: The automation peer that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> that holds the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: De automation peer die is gekoppeld aan de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"> </xref> waarin zich de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt het besturingselementtype voor de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"> </xref> dat is gekoppeld aan dit <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt de naam van de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"> </xref> dat is gekoppeld aan dit <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type name of the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref>.

Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald van het besturingselement patroon voor de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"> </xref> die is gekoppeld aan de <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Een value-opsomming die het patroon van het besturingselement.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is the , , or value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is the , , or value; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> into the visible region of the container.
trans-unit.target: Schuift de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"> </xref> in het zichtbare gebied van de container.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dit lid is een expliciete interface lid-implementatie.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Het kan worden gebruikt alleen wanneer de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer>exemplaar is geconverteerd naar een <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer>
